document.full_text: chinese authorities have arrested a veteran dissident, zhu yufu, on subversion charges, his ex-wife and a friend said on wednesday, making him the fourth activist known to have been arrested and likely to face trial in a crackdown on dissent.
document.title: china arrests fourth dissident in "jasmine" crackdown
lines_and_colors: chinese authorities have arrested a veteran dissident, zhu yufu, on subversion charges, his ex-wife and a friend said on wednesday, making him the fourth activist known to have been arrested and likely to face trial in a crackdown on dissent.
